paragraphs.content: Chapter 5
paragraphs.contentHtml: Chapter 5

paragraphs.content: But of the times and the seasons, brethren, ye have no need that I write unto you.
paragraphs.contentHtml: But of the times and the seasons, brethren, ye have no need that I write unto you.

paragraphs.content: For yourselves know perfectly that the day of the Lord so cometh as a thief in the night.
paragraphs.contentHtml: For yourselves know perfectly that the day of the Lord so cometh as a thief in the night.

paragraphs.content: For when they shall say, Peace and safety; then sudden destruction cometh upon them, as travail upon a woman with child; and they shall not escape.
paragraphs.contentHtml: For when they shall say, Peace and safety; then sudden destruction cometh upon them, as travail upon a woman with child; and they shall not escape.

paragraphs.content: But ye, brethren, are not in darkness, that that day should overtake you as a thief.
paragraphs.contentHtml: But ye, brethren, are not in darkness, that that day should overtake you as a thief.

paragraphs.content: Ye are all the children of light, and the children of the day: we are not of the night, nor of darkness.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Ye are all the children of light, and the children of the day: we are not of the night, nor of darkness.

paragraphs.content: Therefore let us not sleep, as do others; but let us watch and be sober.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Therefore let us not sleep, as do others; but let us watch and be sober.

paragraphs.content: For they that sleep sleep in the night; and they that be drunken are drunken in the night.
paragraphs.contentHtml: For they that sleep sleep in the night; and they that be drunken are drunken in the night.

paragraphs.content: But let us, who are of the day, be sober, putting on the breastplate of faith and love; and for an helmet, the hope of salvation.
paragraphs.contentHtml: But let us, who are of the day, be sober, putting on the breastplate of faith and love; and for an helmet, the hope of salvation.

paragraphs.content: For God hath not appointed us to wrath, but to obtain salvation by our Lord Jesus Christ,
paragraphs.contentHtml: For God hath not appointed us to wrath, but to obtain salvation by our Lord Jesus Christ,

paragraphs.content: Who died for us, that, whether we wake or sleep, we should live together with him.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Who died for us, that, whether we wake or sleep, we should live together with him.

paragraphs.content: Wherefore comfort yourselves together, and edify one another, even as also ye do.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Wherefore comfort yourselves together, and edify one another, even as also ye do.

paragraphs.content: And we beseech you, brethren, to know them which labour among you, and are over you in the Lord, and admonish you;
paragraphs.contentHtml: And we beseech you, brethren, to know them which labour among you, and are over you in the Lord, and admonish you;

paragraphs.content: And to esteem them very highly in love for their work’s sake. And be at peace among yourselves.
paragraphs.contentHtml: And to esteem them very highly in love for their work’s sake. And be at peace among yourselves.

paragraphs.content: Now we exhort you, brethren, warn them that are unruly, comfort the feebleminded, support the weak, be patient toward all men.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Now we exhort you, brethren, warn them that are unruly, comfort the feebleminded, support the weak, be patient toward all men.

paragraphs.content: See that none render evil for evil unto any man; but ever follow that which is good, both among yourselves, and to all men.
paragraphs.contentHtml: See that none render evil for evil unto any man; but ever follow that which is good, both among yourselves, and to all men.

paragraphs.content: Rejoice evermore.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Rejoice evermore.

paragraphs.content: Pray without ceasing.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Pray without ceasing.

paragraphs.content: In every thing give thanks: for this is the will of God in Christ Jesus concerning you.
paragraphs.contentHtml: In every thing give thanks: for this is the will of God in Christ Jesus concerning you.

paragraphs.content: Quench not the Spirit.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Quench not the Spirit.

paragraphs.content: Despise not prophesyings.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Despise not prophesyings.

paragraphs.content: Prove all things; hold fast that which is good.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Prove all things; hold fast that which is good.

paragraphs.content: Abstain from all appearance of evil.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Abstain from all appearance of evil.

paragraphs.content: And the very God of peace sanctify you wholly; and I pray God your whole spirit and soul and body be preserved blameless unto the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ.
paragraphs.contentHtml: And the very God of peace sanctify you wholly; and I pray God your whole spirit and soul and body be preserved blameless unto the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ.

paragraphs.content: Faithful is he that calleth you, who also will do it.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Faithful is he that calleth you, who also will do it.

paragraphs.content: Brethren, pray for us.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Brethren, pray for us.

paragraphs.content: Greet all the brethren with an holy kiss.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Greet all the brethren with an holy kiss.

paragraphs.content: I charge you by the Lord that this epistle be read unto all the holy brethren.
paragraphs.contentHtml: I charge you by the Lord that this epistle be read unto all the holy brethren.

paragraphs.content: The grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with you. Amen.
paragraphs.contentHtml: The grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with you. Amen.

paragraphs.content: ¶ The first epistle unto the Thessalonians was written from Athens.*
paragraphs.contentHtml: ¶ The first epistle unto the Thessalonians was written from Athens.*
